attributes.action: Make Bobby Mc Ferrins "Dont worry be happy!" our National Anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see Bobby McFerrins Classic Feelgood song "Dont Worry Be Happy!" made into our new national anthem.

Such lines as "In every life we have some trouble....when you worry you make it double...dont worry ...be happy!"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
